lead_paragraph: Carlos Gómez, the Mets’ precocious 21-year-old outfielder, does not play with discretion. He takes wide turns on singles to the outfield, dives headfirst for balls and shows no fear at the plate.
snippet: Carlos Gómez, the Mets’ precocious 21-year-old outfielder, does not play with discretion. He takes wide turns on singles to the outfield, dives headfirst for balls and shows no fear at the plate.
